autox.json.name: AutoX
autox.json.short_description: It is a company building hardware and software integrated technology for autonomous vehicles.

brembo.json.name: Brembo
brembo.json.short_description: It is an Italian manufacturer of automotive braking systems, especially for high-performance cars and motorcycles

cariad.json.name: Cariad
cariad.json.short_description: Automotive software brand within the Volkswagen Group

clearguidemedical.json.name: Clear Guide Medical
clearguidemedical.json.short_description: Leader in next-gen medical imaging fusion and navigation technology. It is a spinout of the Johns Hopkins Medical Institutions and The Johns Hopkins University.

climeworks.json.name: Climeworks
climeworks.json.short_description: High-quality carbon removal for your climate strategy via Climeworks' direct air capture and storage (DAC+S) technology.

cruise.json.name: Cruise
cruise.json.short_description: It tests and develops autonomous car technology. The company is a largely autonomous subsidiary of General Motors.

deepmind.json.name: Google Deep Mind
deepmind.json.short_description: Team of scientists, engineers, ethicists and more, committed to solving intelligence, to advance science and benefit humanity.Open positions in robotics, automation and AI.

dlr.json.name: DLR German Aerospace Center
dlr.json.short_description: It is the Federal Republic of Germany's research centre for aeronautics and space. It conducts research and development activities in the fields of aeronautics, space, energy, transport, security and digitalisation.

drb.json.name: DRB
drb.json.short_description: DRB provides autonomous drone inspection services. It is a small startup, spinoof of Politecnico di Milano.

driveblocks.json.name: Driveblocks
driveblocks.json.short_description: Spinoff of TUM Institute of Automotive Technology. They design software modules to drive heavy duty vehicles in container terminals, mining, agriculture, and hub-to-hub logistics.

easysmile.json.name: Easysmile
easysmile.json.short_description: Autonomous driving solutons both for people and goods

embarktrucks.json.name: Embarktrucks
embarktrucks.json.short_description: Autonomous trucks. It makes automotive-grade self-driving software that can transform any fleet into an autonomous one.

embotech.json.name: Embotech
embotech.json.short_description: Provider of AI software for autonomous systems. Our automation solutions bring significant improvements in safety, productivity, and energy efficiency to logistics yards, ports, mines and smart factories. Applications include automated driving for passenger cars and commercial vehicles, energy management solutions as well as industrial robotics automation.

fenride.json.name: Fenride
fenride.json.short_description: Spinoff of TUM Institute of Automotive Technology. Remote control of logistic vehicle

intrinsic.json.name: Intrinsic
intrinsic.json.short_description: Alphabet robots. obotics software and AI company at Alphabet. Its mission is to make industrial robotics accessible and usable for millions more businesses, entrepreneurs, and developers.

leitner.json.name: Leitner
leitner.json.short_description: Ropeways, snow groomers, urban transportation systems, and wind energy.

loxo.json.name: Loxo
loxo.json.short_description: Fully automated goods transport system for last-mile-delivery

medtronic.json.name: Medtronic
medtronic.json.headquarter: Minneapolis, USA, (offices all over the world)
medtronic.json.short_description: While it primarily operates in the United States, it operates in more than 150 countries and employs over 90,000 people. It develops and manufactures healthcare technologies and therapies.

nvidia.json.name: Nvidia Drive
nvidia.json.short_description: Nvidia robotics research labs, mostly PhDs

optiver.json.name: Optiver
optiver.json.short_description: Trading firm, highest paid internship of the world

polestar.json.name: Polestar
polestar.json.short_description: Automotive company controlled by Volvo. It produces electric vehicles.

rheinmetall.json.name: Rheinmetall Defence
rheinmetall.json.short_description: Defence company with an Electronic Systems division

roboat.json.name: Roboat
roboat.json.short_description: Autonomous boat. It creates boats that can perceive, navigate, and perform tasks on their own.

roboatnik.json.name: Roboatnik
roboatnik.json.short_description: Autonomous mobile robots. The headquarters is in Spain!

rse.json.name: RSE Ricerca Sistema Energetico
rse.json.short_description: It carries out research in the electro-energy sector with particular attention to national strategic projects.

thermosphr.json.name: Thermosphr
thermosphr.json.short_description: Plug and play software for energy efficient real estate

unicaragil.json.name: UNICARagil
unicaragil.json.short_description: Disruptive Modular Architecture for Agile Automated Vehicle Concepts

voltatruck.json.name: Volta Trucks
voltatruck.json.short_description: They manufacture and provide services for electric trucks. The company's registered offices are Stockholm and London, with operations in both countries as well as France, Spain, The Netherlands and Austria. Volta Trucks' Head Office is in Stockholm with its engineering-led from the UK, and manufacturing facility in Steyr, Austria.

waymo.json.name: Waymo
waymo.json.headquarter: Moutain View, USA and Dublin, Ireland

wayve.json.name: Wayve
wayve.json.short_description: Deep learning for self driving. Unicorn startup.

wingtra.json.name: Wingtra
wingtra.json.short_description: Computer vision on drones for automatic mapping

zoox.json.name: Zoox
zoox.json.short_description: It is a subsidiary of Amazon developing autonomous vehicles
